channel.title: I need help!
channel.description:
im not so good in coding i onley know the basic stuff. i rly need an easy source to code on. i have done some codin before but i get lost and destroy the source. i have been trying to add stuff like godsword and bandos but when i use pickup or add to a shop the server freez. if i pickup it freez right away when i hit enter, and when i add to a shop it freez when i trade the shop.
sorry about my bad english.
crom170.

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you are new to coding, start with silabs client and All-Stars Source or a source like it.

item.description:

just change your current client, i suggest you to get item ids with silabsoft and use that client so u wont get worried, also, you probaly know that u need to do more than just add to item.cfg that ids, dont you? …

item.title: I need help!

item.description:

so how could i add bandos and stuff.

thx rich
